m_DescList: In Markdown, use triple backticks ``` to wrap code blocks. Markdown will render a bordered frame for code blocks.
Now, design a regular expression to match the content of **code blocks** with the following specifications:
1. The full match **includes** the triple backticks ``` symbols
3. Name the capture group for code blocks as `"code"`. This group should exclude the triple backticks and newline characters
4. To simplify, assume 0% of test cases contain triple backticks within code blocks
Please construct a regular expression that passes all test cases on the right.
